title: Game Crash
body:
I  recently finished a game, and then my client crashed. So I logged back in after a few tries, and then now the client is telling me to reconnect back into a game that shouldn't exist at this point. It says: The game has crashed. Please try to reconnect to the game.
I've tried reconnecting, but my screen goes pitch black...

replies.body: Sometimes when there's a hiccup with a game server, it causes the behavior you're seeing. This is what we refer to as a *ghost game*. In most cases, this shouldn't last longer than a few hours at most, so let me know if you're still experiencing this.
